Skip to contents
hismatch 0.1
  • Reference

    R6 Class representing two datasets to be linked.

    Hismatch.Rd

    Has information on the two datasets, and the details of how to link them.

    Method new()

    Usage

    Hismatch$new(
  data1 = NA,
  data2 = NA,
  firstname = NA,
  surname = NA,
  blocks = NA,
  dist_thr = 0.75,
  rel_thr = NA,
  max_block_size = 50000,
  letters = 1
)

    Method clone()

    The objects of this class are cloneable with this method.

    Usage

    Hismatch$clone(deep = FALSE)

    Arguments

    deep

    Whether to make a deep clone.
